mapper.select: select m.mcumem_no from resume r join matchupmem m on r.resume_no=m.resume_no join expertise e on m.expertise_no=e.expertise_no where e.skill like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mapper.insert:
select expertise_seq.nextval from dual
insert into expertise(expertise_No,jikgun_Code,career,salary,skill) values(#{expertiseNo}, #{jikgunCode}, #{career}, #{salary}, #{skill})
